articles.title: Gravitas: UK detects polio after 40 years - WION
articles.description:
Polio has returned to the UK after 40 years. The virus has been detected in London's sewage samples.
Authorities have declared a 'national incident'. Investigations are underway to track community transmission. Palki Sharma reports.
